name: Moby's Revenge
description:
Super cute endless runner!!! - Swim as Moby the Whale and get revenge.

*****

Evil Humans captured poor Moby in an aquarium. After rescuing Moby he gets his Revenge and starts his jellycious journey. Moby uses the waste of the Humans as a Tool against them. Collect Starfishes and upgrade his special abilities to get even higher and higher scores. Collect all the Achievements and challenge your friends on Game Center.

*****

Features:

•Transform into different whales
•Simple one touch gameplay
•Over 700 Achievement points
•Challenging missions
•Level up Moby with powerful upgrades
•Compete against friends on the global highscore list
•Secret shake ability

*****

UNIVERSAL APP

Play across all supported devices - iPhone 4, iPhone 4S, iPhone 5, iPhone 5C, iPhone 5S, iPad 2, iPad 3, iPad 4, iPad Air, iPad Mini, or iPod Touch 5

*****

A jellycious journey for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch!

*****
